query.statement:
SELECT '' CHK, A.TEM_NM TEM_NM, -- 팀명 A.ARA_NM ARA_NM, -- 지역명 A.BSU_NM BSU_NM, -- 협력사명 A.UPN UPN, -- 통합프로젝트 A.CST CST, -- 거래선 A.GNO GNO, -- 유상계약번호 MAX(A.GKD) GKD, MAX(ZCD01.CTEXT2) GKD_NM, MAX(A.SPT) SPT, -- 현장명 MAX(A.ADR) ADR, -- 현장주소 MAX(A.ANT) ANT, -- 전체대수(HRTS + DI-PBX) SUM(A.HNT) HNT, -- HRTS대수 SUM(A.DNT) DNT, -- DI-PBX대수 SUM(A.HNT_F) HNT_F, -- HRTS 신규 대수 SUM(A.DNT_F) DNT_F, -- DI-PBX 신규 대수 SUM(A.AMT) AMT, -- 전체공급가액 SUM(A.HMT) HMT, -- HRTS공급가액 SUM(A.DMT) DMT, -- DI-PBX공급가액 CASE WHEN MAX(A.ANT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(A.AMT) / MAX(A.ANT),0) END AAR, -- 전체평균단가 CASE WHEN SUM(A.HNT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(A.HMT) / SUM(A.HNT),0) END HAR, -- HRTS평균단가 CASE WHEN SUM(A.DNT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(A.DMT) / SUM(A.DNT),0) END DAR, -- DI-PBX평균단가 MIN(A.GBN) GBN, -- 계약구분(FM/POG) MAX(A.USD) USD, -- 계약시작일 MAX(A.ADT) ADT, -- 계약승인일 MAX(A.RMR) RMR, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(MAX(A.MDT),'ko','CS179',MAX(A.HEP)) HEP_NM, -- 점검주기명 MAX(A.CRT) CRT, -- 유선대수 MAX(A.WRL) WRL, -- 무선대수 MAX(A.SFT) SFT, -- 설치완료대수 MAX(A.HCD) HCD, -- HRTS통신신청일 MAX(A.DCD) DCD, -- DI-PBX통신신청일 MAX(A.MCC) MCC, -- CRT날짜 MAX(A.MCD) MCD, -- 단말기날짜 MAX(A.MDC) MDC, -- 단말기대수 MAX(A.MCM) MCM, -- 모뎀날짜 MAX(A.MMC) MMC, -- 모뎀대수 MAX(A.SFD) SFD, -- 설치완료일 MAX(A.RMK) RMK, -- 비고 MAX(A.EMAIL) EMAIL, -- 이메일 MAX(A.EMAIL2) EMAIL2, -- 이메일2 MAX(A.SPEC12) SPEC12, -- 전기기종 MAX(A.MMR) MMR, -- 자재신청 MAX(A.MMA) MMA, -- 자재신청승인 MAX(A.MMT) MMT, -- 내용 MAX(JUJ) JUJ, ( SELECT CCSB1EPN FROM SAPHEE.ZTBCSB1 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CCSB1EMP = MAX(JUJ) ) JUJ_NM, ( SELECT CCSB1EML FROM SAPHEE.ZTBCSB1 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CCSB1EMP = MAX(JUJ) ) JUJ_EMAIL, ( SELECT CS099_EML FROM SAPHEE.ZCST099 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS099_GNO = MAX(LIFNR) ) EMAIL3, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(MAX(A.MDT),'ko','CS123',MIN(A.BLD)) BLD_NM, MAX(A.TE3) TE3 ,MAX(A.TYN) AS TYN -- 감시반여부 ,MAX(A.LASTGNO) AS LASTGNO ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.HST = 'F' OR A.HST = 'D' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LFAIL ,COUNT(CS126.CS126_GNO) AS LCNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN CS126.CS126_HYN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LHCNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN CS126.CS126_DYN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LDCNT ,MAX(CS126.CS126_RGS) AS LRGS ,MAX(CS126.CS126_RMR) AS LRMR FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT MDT, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'ko','VKGRP',D.VKGRP) TEM_NM, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'CS115',A.CS126_ARA) ARA_NM, D.ABR_NM BSU_NM, A.CS126_UPN UPN, A.CS126_CST CST, A.CS126_GNO GNO, A.CS126_PJT PJT, A.CS126_HNO HNO, A.CS126_GKD GKD, CS111B.HST HST, ( SELECT VALUE(CS126_GNO,'') FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND CS126_PJT = A.CS126_PJT AND CS126_HNO = A.CS126_HNO AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_GND = 'D' AND CS126_UMR >= HEX(CURRENT DATE) ORDER BY CS126_UMR DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) LASTGNO, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND POSID = A.CS126_PJT AND SUBSTR(POSID_1,7,1) = 'T' ) TYN, E.CS121_SPT SPT, F.ADDR1 || ' ' || F.ADDR2 ADR, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND CS126_UPN = A.CS126_UPN AND CS126_CST = A.CS126_CST AND CS126_GNO = A.CS126_GNO AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_GND = 'D' AND (CS126_FHG = 'Y' OR CS126_FDG = 'Y') AND (CS126_HYN = 'Y' OR CS126_DYN = 'Y') ) ANT, CASE WHEN A.CS126_HYN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END HNT, CASE WHEN A.CS126_DYN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DNT, CASE WHEN (A.CS126_HYN = 'Y' AND A.CS126_FHG = 'Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END HNT_F, CASE WHEN (A.CS126_DYN = 'Y' AND A.CS126_FDG = 'Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DNT_F, A.CS126_AMT AMT, CASE WHEN A.CS126_HYN = 'Y' THEN A.CS126_HMT ELSE 0 END HMT, CASE WHEN A.CS126_DYN = 'Y' THEN A.CS126_DMT ELSE 0 END DMT, CASE WHEN A.CS126_KND > '' THEN 'FM' ELSE 'POG' END GBN, A.CS126_USD USD, A.CS126_ADT ADT, A.CS126_RMR RMR, A.CS126_HEP HEP, VALUE(B.CS401_CRT,0) CRT, VALUE(B.CS401_WRL,0) WRL, VALUE(B.CS401_SFT,0) SFT, VALUE(B.CS401_HCD,'') HCD, VALUE(B.CS401_DCD,'') DCD, VALUE(B.CS401_MCC,'') MCC, VALUE(B.CS401_MCD,'') MCD, VALUE(B.CS401_MDC,0) MDC, VALUE(B.CS401_MCM,'') MCM, VALUE(B.CS401_MMC,0) MMC, VALUE(B.CS401_SFD,'') SFD, VALUE(B.CS401_RMK,'') RMK, E.CS121_EM1 EMAIL, E.CS121_EM3 EMAIL2, G.ZSPEC12 SPEC12, CASE WHEN B.CS401_MMR = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END MMR, CASE WHEN B.CS401_MMA = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END MMA, VALUE(B.CS401_MMT,'') MMT, CS111B.JUJ JUJ, D.LIFNR LIFNR, VALUE(CS111B.BLD,'') BLD, E.CS121_TE3 TE3 FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST401 B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.CS401_UPN = A.CS126_UPN AND B.CS401_CST = A.CS126_CST AND B.CS401_GNO = A.CS126_GNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 CS111B ON A.MANDT = CS111B.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = CS111B.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = CS111B.HNO,
SAPHEE.ZLCODE C, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 D, SAPHEE.ZCST121 E, SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 F, SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 G WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_FHG = 'Y' AND A.CS126_HYN = 'Y' AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_ARA = C.CODE2 AND C.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND C.LANG = 'ko' AND A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = D.LGORT AND D.LGORT > '' AND A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.CS126_UPN = E.CS121_UPN AND A.CS126_CST = E.CS121_CST AND A.MANDT = F.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = F.POSID AND A.MANDT = G.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT||A.CS126_HNO = G.POSID_1 AND VALUE(CS111B.EXC,'') = ''
AND (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.CS126_ADT,1,6) = SUBSTR(A.CS126_USD,1,6) THEN A.CS126_ADT WHEN SUBSTR(A.CS126_ADT,1,6) > SUBSTR(A.CS126_USD,1,6) THEN A.CS126_ADT WHEN SUBSTR(A.CS126_ADT,1,6) < SUBSTR(A.CS126_USD,1,6) THEN A.CS126_USD END) BETWEEN #FYM#||'01' AND #TYM#||'31' --승인일 기준
AND A.CS126_USD BETWEEN #FYM#||'01' AND #TYM#||'31'
AND A.CS126_ADT BETWEEN #FYM#||'01' AND #TYM#||'31'
AND A.CS126_ARA = #ARA#
AND D.LGORT = #BSU#
AND A.CS126_BPM = #BPM#
AND D.VKGRP = #TEM#
AND A.CS126_HEP = #HEP#
AND A.CS126_KND > ''
AND A.CS126_KND = ''
AND A.CS126_UPN = #UPN#
AND A.CS126_CST = #CST#
AND A.CS126_PJT = #PJT#
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 AS CS126 ON CS126.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126.CS126_GNO = A.LASTGNO AND CS126.CS126_PJT = A.PJT AND CS126.CS126_HNO = A.HNO AND CS126.CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126.CS126_PST = 'A6'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS ZCD01 ON ZCD01.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ZCD01.CODE1 = 'CS130' AND ZCD01.CODE2 = A.GKD AND ZCD01.LANG = #G_LANG# GROUP BY A.TEM_NM, A.ARA_NM, A.BSU_NM, A.UPN, A.CST, A.GNO WITH UR
